Units.Unit_Name: Provide Knowledge On Structure And Replication Of Dna
Topics: Study of different types of DNA and RNA using micrographs and model / schematic representations.
Study of semi-conservative replication of DNA through micrographs / schematic representations.

Units.Unit_Name: Elucidate The Methods Of Genomic And Plasmid Dna
Topics: Isolation of Genomic and Plasmid DNA from E.
coli and Analysis by Agarose gel electrophoresis.
Estimation of DNA using colorimeter (Diphenylamine reagent), UV spectrophotometer (A260 measurement).
Resolution and visualization of proteins by polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE) – Demonstration.
UV induced auxotrophic mutant production and isolation of mutants by replica plating technique – Demonstration.
Isolation of antibiotic resistant mutants by gradient plate method.

Units.Unit_Name: Outline The Role Of Phages In Genetics
Topics: Screening and isolation of phages from sewage.

course_outcomes.1: Illustrate different types of DNA and RNA.
course_outcomes.2: Utilize hands-on training in isolation of genomic and plasmid DNA.
course_outcomes.3: Analyze importance of experimental microbial genetics.
course_outcomes.4: Apply the knowledge of molecular techniques in various fields.
